title: Kipirita ilkurto le Korona
licenseNotes: Mimbeleny lomon lena buku, kake indim aibelekenya aigerie nkae kutuk, aiger anaa natiu nkae oitiei, ninchooyo pee easichoreki nemenyayieki beechera. Meata nchere pee mimbalie lopenye lomon achu laigeroni o loicherua nkitanyanyukot Weiman Kou.
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: Keicharu ana buku nkitanapat e tipat naarieki ilkurto le Korona COVID 19

10.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ketii ake ntoki NABO nayieu nining’u kipirita neiko ilkurto le Korona
10.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

11.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ketii ake ntoki NABO nayieu nining’u kipirita neiko ilkurto le Korona
11.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

26.saq-x-Ilchamus: Keibulaa ele kurto tenejing kuna kamilak achu ilchama achu ilkiyio

27.saq-x-Ilchamus: Keibulaa ele kurto tenejing kuna kamilak achu ilchama achu ilkiyio

28.saq-x-Ilchamus: Talama. Ore ntemet oo nkejek are naa kirrip too nkamilak kumok.
28.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

29.saq-x-Ilchamus: Talama. Ore ntemet oo nkejek are naa kirrip too nkamilak kumok.
29.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

36.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

37.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

38.saq-x-Ilchamus: Nchoo ninche nkitambaa naikenie nkumechin o nkutuk. Teneirogaki ninche inia kitambaa naa kerrip pooki ng’ae otaanikita
38.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

39.saq-x-Ilchamus: Nchoo ninche nkitambaa naikenie nkumechin o nkutuk. Teneirogaki ninche inia kitambaa naa kerrip pooki ng’ae otaanikita
39.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

46.saq-x-Ilchamus: Kebaki naa memoi ninye, kake kerripito ake koon.
46.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

47.saq-x-Ilchamus: Kebaki naa memoi ninye, kake kerripito ake koon.
47.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

48.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore iltung’ana oitasuroki ana moyian naa keidim metaa metii ntoki naitodolu ajo kemoi, kake kenapita moyian te sesen.
48.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

49.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore iltung’ana oitasuroki ana moyian naa keidim metaa metii ntoki naitodolu ajo kemoi, kake kenapita moyian te sesen.
49.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

50.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore te nkidapach, kesidai teneaku milo neiturrurrore siamu oo iltung’ana, naa te nkaraki miyiolo ajo ng’ae omoita.
50.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

51.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore te nkidapach, kesidai teneaku milo neiturrurrore siamu oo iltung’ana, naa te nkaraki miyiolo ajo ng’ae omoita.
51.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

66.saq-x-Ilchamus: Achu ejing abaki oriong nkitambaa naitemorieki nkomom
66.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

67.saq-x-Ilchamus: Achu ejing abaki oriong nkitambaa naitemorieki nkomom
67.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

78.saq-x-Ilchamus: Kake, ore te nkae kata kejing nkamilak e iltung’ani omoi nkulie tokitin…
78.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

79.saq-x-Ilchamus: Kake, ore te nkae kata kejing nkamilak e iltung’ani omoi nkulie tokitin…
79.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

86.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore tinimbung nabo oo kuna tokitin eitu itemu, nimbung nkomom ino,
86.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

87.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore tinimbung nabo oo kuna tokitin eitu itemu, nimbung nkomom ino,
87.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

88.saq-x-Ilchamus: Naa ore ake nkoitiei namut kulo kurt naa tinintukie nenia tokitin sabuni, ilcheni oitai loiririo achu mpukunoto e naicho.
88.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

89.saq-x-Ilchamus: Naa ore ake nkoitiei namut kulo kurt naa tinintukie nenia tokitin sabuni, ilcheni oitai loiririo achu mpukunoto e naicho.
89.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

90.saq-x-Ilchamus: Kewuon oleng ilkurt too nkuti saai etii ntokitin naibung’a iltung’ani oata ilo kurto
90.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

91.saq-x-Ilchamus: Kewuon oleng ilkurt too nkuti saai etii ntokitin naibung’a iltung’ani oata ilo kurto
91.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

96.saq-x-Ilchamus: Naa inia pee esidai sii pee inkurukore kuna
96.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

97.saq-x-Ilchamus: Naa inia pee esidai sii pee inkurukore kuna
97.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

98.en: wash with soap up to here

99.en: wash with soap up to here

104.saq-x-Ilchamus: Mimbung nkomom ino. (achu imbung nkomom e likae ake tung’ani.) Tanaa meata nchere pee mimbung, tang’asa ntuko oleng nkaik inono te sabuni.
104.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

105.saq-x-Ilchamus: Mimbung nkomom ino. (achu imbung nkomom e likae ake tung’ani.) Tanaa meata nchere pee mimbung, tang’asa ntuko oleng nkaik inono te sabuni.
105.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

106.saq-x-Ilchamus: Nkata nairirikino tinirany ajo “Nchipai e inoto” aigil are
106.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

107.saq-x-Ilchamus: Nkata nairirikino tinirany ajo “Nchipai e inoto” aigil are
107.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

114.en: wash the back of your hands

115.en: wash the back of your hands

118.saq-x-Ilchamus: Naa tanaa itaasa inia, miurechoi. Intuko ake iyie nkaik inono te sabuni indipa.
118.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

119.saq-x-Ilchamus: Naa tanaa itaasa inia, miurechoi. Intuko ake iyie nkaik inono te sabuni indipa.
119.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

120.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore sii, mimbung oriong e nkitambaa e nkomom tanaa keidimai.
120.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

121.saq-x-Ilchamus: Ore sii, mimbung oriong e nkitambaa e nkomom tanaa keidimai.
121.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

124.saq-x-Ilchamus: *Kebulaki bakiteria atua nkitambaa ino e nkomom tinichop te richata naodo
124.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

125.saq-x-Ilchamus: *Kebulaki bakiteria atua nkitambaa ino e nkomom tinichop te richata naodo
125.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

126.saq-x-Ilchamus: Tanang’ai nkitambaa naikenieki nkomom teneaku etijing’a loiririo. Mintoki aicho metulusori mparri!
126.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

127.saq-x-Ilchamus: Tanang’ai nkitambaa naikenieki nkomom teneaku etijing’a loiririo. Mintoki aicho metulusori mparri!
127.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

138.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

139.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

140.saq-x-Ilchamus: Meidimai nimbung nkomom ino te lopi le nkaina ino abaki tininyok ajo aibung
140.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

141.saq-x-Ilchamus: Meidimai nimbung nkomom ino te lopi le nkaina ino abaki tininyok ajo aibung
141.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

142.saq-x-Ilchamus: Tanaa keidimai tobolie ninkeinie lopi  le nkaina ino achu ronyi linono alang tanaa ibolie nkaik.
142.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

143.saq-x-Ilchamus: Tanaa keidimai tobolie ninkeinie lopi  le nkaina ino achu ronyi linono alang tanaa ibolie nkaik.
143.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
